name: DRESS THE HOCKEY BABY
description:
One-week prototype for Prototype Studio (week 5). The prompt was "what do Winter Olympians do to cool down after the Olympics?" The sport I was assigned was hockey.

Play as the American mom or the Canadian mom to dress your baby the most American or the most Canadian way. Competitive 1v1 baby dressing game (prototype)!

Each clothing item that stands for your country counts as one point. Speedily place the clothes on the baby to earn points and take off the other mom's clothes that she put on the baby to replace it with yours, all under a time limit, because the baby certainly doesn't have enough patience for your shenanigans!

Inspired by Julie Chu and Caroline Ouellette's baby dressing instagram posts.
